name: GetPlayerObjectModel
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Retrieve the model ID of a player-object.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player whose player-object to get the model of

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The ID of the player-object of which to retrieve the model ID

return_values: The model ID of the player object. If the player or object don't exist, it will return -1 or 0 if the player or object does not exist.
pawn_code:
new objectid = CreatePlayerObject(playerid, 1234, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
new modelid = GetPlayerObjectModel(playerid, objectid);
related_fn: GetObjectModel: Get the model ID of an object.
